title: Date of the contract
explanation: The date is explicitly mentioned in the text as 'dated as of November 15, 2012'.

title: Party A
explanation: Party A is clearly identified in the text as 'THE BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA'.

title: party_B
explanation: Party B is clearly identified in the text as 'Halifax Funding LLC'.

title: Specified entity Party A
explanation: The text explicitly states that the Specified Entity for Party A is 'none'.

title: Specified entity Party B
explanation: The text specifies 'KKR Asset Management LLC' as the Specified Entity for Party B.

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The definition of 'Specified Transaction' aligns with the standard definition in Section 14 of the ISDA Master Agreement, covering a broad range of financial transactions.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text explicitly states that the 'Cross Default' provisions apply to both Party A and Party B.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text does not mention borrowed money in the context of specified indebtedness.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that specified indebtedness shall not include obligations in respect of deposits.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: The text does not specify an exact amount for Party A.

title: currency for Party A
explanation: The text does not specify a currency for Party A.

title: percentage for Party A
explanation: The text explicitly states '3% of the total shareholders' equity of Party A'.

title: percentage reference for Party A
explanation: The percentage is based on 'total shareholders' equity of Party A'.

title: amount for Party B
explanation: The text does not specify an exact amount for Party B.

title: currency for Party B
explanation: The text does not specify a currency for Party B.

title: percentage for Party B
explanation: The text explicitly states '3% of its Net Asset Value' for Party B.

title: percentage reference for Party B
explanation: The percentage is based on 'Net Asset Value' for Party B.

title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Credit Event Upon Merger' provisions apply to both Party A and Party B.

title: Automatic Early Termination  applicable parties
explanation: The text explicitly states that 'Automatic Early Termination' will not apply to Party A and will not apply to Party B, except under specific conditions not generally applicable.

title: Termination Currency
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Termination Currency' means United States Dollars, which corresponds to the ISO code 'USD'.

title: Email for notices for Party A
explanation: The text does not mention an email address for notices to Party A.

title: Email for notices for Party B
explanation: The text does not mention an email address for notices to Party B.

title: Process agent for party A
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party A appoints as its Process Agent: Not applicable.'

title: Name of process agent for party A
explanation: Since process agent is not applicable for Party A, no name is provided.

title: Address of process agent for party A
explanation: Since process agent is not applicable for Party A, no address is provided.

title: Process agent for party B
explanation: The text states 'Party B appoints as its Process Agent: Halifax Funding LLC is: National Registered Agents, Inc.' indicating a process agent is appointed.

title: Name of process agent for party B
explanation: The text specifies 'Halifax Funding LLC is: National Registered Agents, Inc.' as the process agent for Party B.

title: Address of process agent for party B
explanation: The address '160 Greentree Drive, Suite 101, Dover, Delaware 19904' is provided for the process agent of Party B.

title: Party A is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party A is a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party A offices
explanation: The text specifies 'acting out of its New York and Toronto Offices.'

title: Party B is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party B is not a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party B offices
explanation: Since Party B is not a Multibranch Party, there are no offices listed.

title: Party for calculation agent
explanation: The text explicitly states 'The Calculation Agent is Party A unless otherwise agreed in a Confirmation in respect to the relevant Transaction.' This indicates that Party A is the default Calculation Agent.

title: Governing Law
explanation: The text explicitly states that the agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
